If they go to receive teachings, they should be of the same kind, and should not go alone to receive teachings.

They can only teach women, and cannot teach men.
The clothes they wear should not be embroidered with silk or colorful flowers.

They should not speak lightly or playfully, should not be greedy for wealth and possessions, and should practice the precepts purely. This is called a person who has left the household life and pursues the Way.
